name: Reality Shift (emimartin)
description:
You awaken aboard a ship, where a voice informs you that you must replace a malfunctioning reality core before the current reality collapses. You now have the ability to manipulate time and realities at your disposal. However, be aware that the malfunction may activate defense systems that may impede your progress. This game was made in 8 days for the GoedWare Game Jam #7. The themes/mechanics were: "Time is Power" and "Alternate Reality". We hope you enjoy it!

Planification server: https://discord.gg/B2KeQ6Bzyn
